review:
*** *** ************* *** had good suggestions for next course of treatment.  Found her to be quite senior and experienced. 
BLK consulting fees was INR 1700 + Registration. 
Wait time was 40 mins 
Vitals check -   Weight and BP

She may be a good doctor *** * *** * ******** ********** **** ****  She asked for old papers but when she came to know that these old papers are of other doctor, she did not bother to see what doctor has observed or prescribed. She did not even see the reports of tests that other doctor had prescribed.  I told her that I am trying for last 1 year but unable to get pregnant, she directly prescribed HSG. while the first step should be give medication that help in evolution. Later she prescribed follicular study.  Her exact prescription is "10th day onwards". She did not told for how many days the test should be done. She even did not bother to mention next day of visit.

*** **** *** I already explain my wife case but still she took lightly and another mis carriage happen. Me and wife already told her for stitches on cervical but she told no issues everything is ok but after 22 weeks pregnancy cervical length open and preterm delivery happen.please do not visit.
She was very patient enough to listen to us and clear our doubts. She seems very professional and experienced
Dr. Laxmi is really wonderful, did a great job. Highly recommended . Explained everything in details and very calmly
